alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Heard (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 7:42PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Carroll and northern Heard Counties through 800 PM EST... At 741 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Woodland, or 7 miles northeast of Wedowee, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Temple, Ephesus, Centralhatchee, Roopville, Frolona, Abilene, Lowell, Plant Wansley, Tyus, Blackjack Mountain and Roosterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
